CHEM 1101.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, laboratory three hours every other week.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): restricted to students with second-year standing in the Bachelor of Engineering program. All ESL requirements must be successfully completed; this course may not be taken concurrently with any ESLA course. Not repeatable for credit when successfully completed with a grade of C or higher.

MATH 1005.course_title: Differential Equations & Infinite Series for Eng. Students
MATH 1005.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, tutorial one hour a week.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): i) MATH 1004; and ii) MATH 1104 (or MATH 1107), either previously or concurrently; or equivalents; or permission of the School. Restricted to students in the Faculty of Engineering, or in certain B.Sc. programs where specified.

MATH 2004.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, tutorial one hour a week.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): i) MATH 1005 or MATH 2007; and ii) MATH 1104 or MATH 1107; or permission of the School. Restricted to students in the Faculty of Engineering, or in certain B.Sc. programs where specified.

COMP 1805.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, tutorial one hour a week.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): COMP 1805 with a minimum grade of C-, or permission of the School of Computer Science for those in Combined Honours in Computer Science and Mathematics.
Prerequisite(s): COMP 1805 with a minimum grade of C-, and either COMP 2402 or (SYSC 2004 and SYSC 2100).

CHEM 1001.schedule: Lectures and tutorial four hours a week, laboratory three hours every other week.

CHEM 1002.schedule: Lectures and tutorial four hours a week, laboratory three hours every other week.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): CHEM 1005 with a minimum grade of B-, or CHEM 1001.

BIOL 1103.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, laboratory or tutorial three hours a week.

PHYS 1003.schedule: Lectures three hours a week, laboratory or tutorial three hours a week.

MATH 3705.schedule: Lectures three hours a week and one hour tutorial.

prerequisites.text: Prerequisite(s): i) MATH 1005 or MATH 2404, and ii) MATH 2004 or MATH 2008 or MATH 2009; or permission of the School.
